aws::graph::propositions: # Pilot Incident Information
The defining event was loss of control on ground during takeoff.
The pilot attempted remediation/recovery during takeoff.
A runway excursion occurred during takeoff.
A collision with terrain/object (non-CFIT) occurred during takeoff.
The pilot held a Commercial certificate.
The pilot was 54 years old.
The pilot was male.
The pilot had Single-engine land rating.
The pilot had Multi-engine land rating.
The pilot occupied the front seat.
The pilot had no other aircraft ratings.
The pilot used a 3-point restraint.
The pilot held an Instrument Rating for Airplane.
No second pilot was present.
The pilot had no instructor ratings.
No toxicology was performed on the pilot.
The pilot held a Class 3 Medical Certification without waivers/limitations.
The pilot's last FAA Medical Exam was on April 20, 2020.
The pilot was not an occupational pilot.
The pilot's last Flight Review or Equivalent was on May 16, 2019.
The pilot had 1057 total flight hours across all aircraft.
The pilot had 3 hours total in this make and model of aircraft.
The pilot had 1032 hours as Pilot In Command across all aircraft.
The pilot had 12 flight hours in the last 90 days across all aircraft.
The pilot had 3 flight hours in the last 30 days across all aircraft.
The pilot had 0 flight hours in the last 24 hours across all aircraft.

text:
# Factual Information

## History of Flight

Takeoff | Loss of control on ground (Defining event)
--- | ---
Takeoff | Attempted remediation/recovery
Takeoff | Runway excursion
Takeoff | Collision with terr/obj (non-CFIT)

## Pilot Information

Certificate: | Commercial
--- | ---
Age: | 54,Male
Airplane Rating(s): | Single-engine land; Multi-engine land
Seat Occupied: | Front
Other Aircraft Rating(s): | None
Restraint Used: | 3-point
Instrument Rating(s): | Airplane
Second Pilot Present: | No
Instructor Rating(s): | None
Toxicology Performed: | No
Medical Certification: | Class 3 Without waivers/limitations
Last FAA Medical Exam: | April 20, 2020
Occupational Pilot: | No
Last Flight Review or Equivalent: | May 16, 2019
Flight Time: | 1057 hours (Total, all aircraft), 3 hours (Total, this make and model), 1032 hours (Pilot In Command, all aircraft), 12 hours (Last 90 days, all aircraft), 3 hours (Last 30 days, all aircraft), 0 hours (Last 24 hours, all aircraft)
